overview: Four Valentine's Days. Four stages of bulimia. Four bad, co-dependent dates with Jack. Angela is stuck in a seemingly endless cycle of her eating disorder: starve, binge, purge, repeat. With each day representing a different stage, Angela tries desperately to navigate both her friendship with her best friend and roommate, Kate and her co-dependent relationship with her very own St. Valentine over a four year period.
tagline: What's Valentine's Day without a little bit of self-destruction?
title: The Blind Girl
